title: Topic 006 Question 041
body: You need to recommend a disaster recovery solution for an on-premises Microsoft SQL Server database. The solution must meet the following requirements:
•	Support real-time data replication to a different geographic region.
•	Use Azure as a disaster recovery target.
What should you include in the recommendation?
options: database mirroring on an instance of SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
availability groups for SQL Server on Azure Virtual Machines
an Azure SQL Managed Instance link
transactional replication to an Azure SQL Managed Instance
